name: Odonata
description:
NOTE

Unfortunately this game is a little buggy as I won't have time to do any more work on it before the end of the Game Boy Jam. You can complete it though, I was a little too ambitious with this project. I could revisit one day.

STORY

In Odonata you control the Odonata drone fighting an evil empire that have invaded the home caves of your species. Fight aliens, destroy barriers and explore a cave system in this shooter inspired by Yar's Revenge, R-Type and Metroid. 

CONTROLS

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Z to Fire
  • R to Retry
  • XInput is implemented but buggy, A to shoot and X to retry
